name: Outslug Weave
text: You land precise attacks from afar.
prerequisites: Int 13; Combat Expertise or brawler’s cunning class feature; Lunge; Outslug Style; Weapon Focus with the chosen weapon.
benefit: While using Outslug Style, you don’t take a –2 penalty to your AC when using the Lunge feat. The bonuses to AC and on weapon damage rolls that you gain from Outslug Style increase to +2.
text_zh: 你可以在远处对敌人的要害发动突击。
prerequisites_zh: 牙突式，智力13，突刺（Lunge），寓守于攻或拳师武学智慧（Brawler's Cunning）职业能力，对所选武器拥有武器专攻专长，BAB+5或武僧等级+5。
benefit_zh: 当你开启牙突式架势时，你不会在使用突刺专长的效果时在防御等级上承受-2减值。并且，牙突式专长为你在防御等级和武器伤害上提供的加值上升到+2。
